title: Problem with Spiking ping.
body: Anyone else having ping that goes up and down from like 50 to 300?

replies.body: Your connection might be having some issues if it's having sudden spikes like that.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of these matches to really know for sure.  Let me know what you find, and we can go from there.
